hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abul-Ahwas 'Awf bin Malik Al- Jushami that his father said:"I said: 'O Messenger of Allah, my cousin comes to me and I swear that I will not give him anything or uphold the ties of kinship with him.' He said: 'Offer expiation for what you swore about

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ حَلَفَ عَلَى يَمِينٍ فَرَأَى غَيْرَهَا خَيْرًا مِنْهَا
chapter.eng-name: One who swears an oath and then sees that something else is better
